awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 33 nominations.

fullplot: Smart-but-ineffectual journalist Dan "We use euphemisms!" cannot decide between his girlfriend, loving-but-clingy waitress Alice, or his lover cold-but-intellectual photographer Anna; herself indecisive between Dan and honest-but-thuggish "You're bloody gorgeous!" doctor Larry. The film, as Tarantino might put it, puts the four leading characters in a box and strips them apart.
plot: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.
title: Closer
